question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please select which of the following statements is more true for you.
Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I concentrate all my energy on a few things, I divide my energy among many things

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I always focus on the one most important goal at a given time, I am always working on several goals at once

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: Even when I really consider what I want in life I wait and see what happens instead of committing myself to just one or two particular goals, When I think about what I want in life I commit myself to one or two important goals

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: Just to achieve a particular goal I am not willing to abandon other ones, To achieve a particular goal I am willing to abandon other goals

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I always pursue goals one after the other,I always pursue many goals at once so that I easily get bogged down

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I know exactly what I want and what I do not want,I often only know what I want as the result of a situation

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I decide upon a goal I stick to it, I can change a goal again at any time

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I always approach several goals at once, I always direct my attention to my most important goal

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I make important life decisions,I do not like to commit myself to speciﬁc life decisions

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I consider exactly what is important for me,I take things as they come and carry on from there

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I do not have many goals in life that are equally important to me,I have many goals in life that are equally important to me

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I often adapt my goals to small changes, I have set my goals clearly and stick to them

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not go as well as before I choose one or two important goals,When things do not go as well as before I still try to keep all my goals

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I cannot do something important the way I did before I distribute my time and energy among many other things, When I cannot do something important the way I did before I look for a new goal

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I cannot do something as well as I used to I wait and see what comes, When I cannot do something as well as I used to I think about what exactly is important to me

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: Even if I cannot do something as well as before I pursue all my goals, If I cannot do something as well as before I concentrate only on essentials

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I cannot carry on as I used to I direct my attention (like usual) to all my goals, When I cannot carry on as I used to I direct my attention to my most important goal

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something becomes increasingly difﬁcult for me I accept it, When something becomes increasingly difﬁcult for me I consider which goals I could achieve under the circumstances

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not go so well I leave it at that, When things do not work so well I pursue my most important goal ﬁrst

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something requires more and more effort I do not worry about it, When something requires more and more effort I think about what exactly I really want

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not go as well as before I wait for better times, When things do not go as well as before I drop some goals to concentrate on the more important ones

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I am not able to achieve something anymore I direct my efforts at what is still possible,When I am not able to achieve something anymore I trust that the situation will improve by itself

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not go as well as before I think about what exactly Is really important to me,When things do not go as well as before I leave it at that

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I can no longer do something in my usual way I think about what exactly I am able to do under the circumstances,When I can no longer do something in my usual way I do not think long about it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I do not succeed right away at what I want to do I do not try other possibilities for very long, I keep working on what I have planned until I succeed

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I prefer to wait for a while and see if things will work out by themselves, I make every effort to achieve a given goal

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: If something matters to me I devote myself fully and completely to it,Even if something matters to me I still have a hard time devoting myself fully and completely to it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I do not keep trying very long when I don’t succeed right away at a goal, I keep trying until I succeed at a goal

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I wait a while ﬁrst to see if my plans do not realize themselves, I do everything I can to realize my plans

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I choose a goal I am also willing to invest much effort in it,I usually choose a goal that I can achieve without much effort

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I want to achieve something I can wait for the right moment,When I want to achieve something I take the ﬁrst opportunity that comes

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I start something that is important to me but has little chance at success I usually stop trying, When I have started something that is important to me but has little chance at success I make a particular effort

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I want to get ahead I take a successful person as a model,When I want to get ahead only I myself know the best way to do it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I think about exactly how I can best realize my plans,I do not think long about how to realize my plans I just try it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something is important to me I do not let setbacks discourage me,Setbacks show me that I should turn to something else

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: I think about when exactly I can best realize my plans,In terms of realizing my plans I begin right away

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not go as well as they used to I accept it, When things do not go as well as they used to I keep trying other ways until I can achieve the same result I used to

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something in my life is not working as well as it used to I decide what to do about it myself without involving other people, When something in my life is not working as well as it used to I ask others for help or advice

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When it becomes harder for me to get the same results I keep trying harder until I can do it as well as before,When it becomes harder for me to get the same results as I used to It is time to let go of that expectation

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: Even if something is important to me It can happen that I do not invest the necessary time or effort, For important things I pay attention to whether I need to devote more time or effort

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: In particularly difﬁcult life situations I try to get help from doctors or counselors or other experts,In particularly difﬁcult life situations I try to manage by myself

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things are not going so well I accept help from others,Even in difﬁcult situations I do not burden others

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When things do not work the way they used to I accept things the way they are, When things do not work the way they used to I look for other ways to achieve them

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I cannot do something as well as before then I ﬁnd out about other ways and means to achieve it,When I cannot do something as well as before then I accept it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I cannot do something as well as I used to I accept the change, When I cannot do something as well as I used to then I ask someone else to do it for me

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When I am afraid of losing something that I have achieved then I invest more time and effort in it,Just to prevent losing what I have achieved I am not willing to invest more time and effort in it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something does not work as well as usual I do not spend much time thinking about it, When something does not work as well as usual I look at how others do it

question_text: Please select which of the two statements is more true for you.
option_text: When something does not work as well as before I am the one who knows what is best for me, When something does not work as well as before I listen to advisory broadcasts and books as well
